mapper.select: SELECT PSN, LCN, FCN, LPID, LTIM, PID, TIM, TF, BAL, TT, RN, APP, FLAG FROM T_MCARD_INVEST_CHECKBACK_HIS WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FLAG='1'
SELECT count(1) AS notesSum,sum(TF) AS amountSum from T_MCARD_INVEST_CHECKBACK_HIS WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FLAG='1'
